import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { create } from '../reducers/anecdoteReducer' import { setNotification } from '../reducers/notificationReducer' const NewAnecdote = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const createAction = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const anecdote = event.target.anecdote.value event.target.anecdote.value = '' dispatch(create(anecdote)) dispatch(setNotification(`created '${anecdote}'`)) } return (

create new

) } export default NewAnecdote
